item.title: learn how to do one minute hacks, in three minutes
item.description: I write this technical blog for you to enjoy, and to help me remember. So where do I get all this knowledge? I figure it out! Here’s how I learned to fix a small gedit annoyance in one minute, and within the next three, you’ll be able to do the same for other types of problems too. Ready? Set? Go! I use gedit enough, that when I hack, I often end up using up more than the five allotted spaces in the “recent files” sections.
